thread.title: Oscar-winning director Milos Forman dies at 86

title: Oscar-winning director Milos Forman dies at 86
text:
Oscar-winning director Milos Forman dies at 86 Saturday, April 14, 2018 - 01:08 
Milos Forman, the Czech-born movie director who found fame in Hollywood with the Oscar-winning classics “One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest” and “Amadeus,” has died at the age of 86. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Milos Forman, the Czech-born movie director who found fame in Hollywood with the Oscar-winning classics “One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest” and “Amadeus,” has died at the age of 86.
